alert.note: Alert for Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:27PM CDT until April 15 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Central Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mountain Grove, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Grove, Houston, Dawson, Raymondville, Huggins, Yukon, Solo, Bucyrus, Simmons, Prescott, Success and Bendavis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
